quotes: On May 5, 2005, the United Nations General Assembly, representing 191 countries, unanimously confirmed Kemal Dervi ş as the Administrator of The United Nations Development Programme (UNDP).
Dervi ş started his four-year term on August 15, 2005.

When Dervi ş became Turkey’s minister of economic affairs in March, 2001, after a 22-year career at the World Bank, the country was facing its worst economic crisis in modern history and prospects for success were uncertaincertain.
Derviş resigned from his ministerial position in August of 2002 and was elected to parliament in November of that year as a member of the main opposition Republican People's Party.
Derviş was elected to parliament in November of that year as a member of the main opposition Republican People's Party.
